name: The Chosen One (Raúl López Martín)
description:
A contemplrative minigame expression one emotion. With a restriction of only use cubes with no textures, trying to express a single emotion. Can you guess which emotion it is? 

  • WASD - Movement
  • Mouse only used in Menu (Intro)

Inspired on the TV Show "The Leftovers"

Music :

Wellerman - Sea Shanty

"The departure" - Max Ritcher
